title: Attempting to reconnect in launcher
body:
whenever i try to login it takes forever to load but eventually loads, but when I reach the client i get a message saying: attampting to re
connect please check if your internet connection is fine. And it is my internet connection is above average my PC is connected via ethernet.
And sometimes the message dissapears for like 30 seconds so there was a window for me to start up an aram game, and the message kept appearing in champ select, and when the loading screen started my game just crashed. and i couldnt get in anymore
i've tried restarting my pc, i also reinstalled but nothing worked

replies.body: Sounds like an unstable connection that's having issues reaching the game server.  Unless there's another ghost issue problem rising (I hope not!), the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help tune up your network while reaching us.
I think it's some kind of false reconnect for me. I can usually reconnect after my allies finish loading in
